General.Name: Satori Resources Inc
General.Description: Canadian Gold Corp. engages in the exploration and development of mineral properties in Canada. Its principal project is the Tartan Lake gold mine project that consists of 20 mineral claims covering an area of approximately 2,670 hectares located northeast of the town of Flin Flon, Manitoba, Canada. The company was formerly known as Satori Resources Inc. and changed its name to Canadian Gold Corp. in May 2023. Canadian Gold Corp. was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 401 Bay Street, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5H 2Y4
